headline: American Express Platinum Refresh Seen Offering Growth Potential Despite Customer Fatigue: Analyst
summary: American Express Company's (NYSE:AXP) refreshed Platinum card has drawn mixed reactions from existing customers but appears promising in attracting new ones, according to a survey of 250 affluent consumers. Truist Securities analyst Brian Foran stated that the consumer poll revealed that 27% of current Platinum holders were optimistic about the changes, 35% were neutral, and 25% were negative. Despite a higher $895 annual fee, resistance was muted, with 68% of respondents indicating they would r

headline: Why Cardlytics (CDLX) Is Up 91.3% After Amex Platinum Card Partnership Spotlighted First-Party Data Role
summary: In recent days, Cardlytics received heightened attention after Citron Research drew a direct link between the company and the refresh of the American Express Platinum card, which features an increased annual fee and expanded benefits. This move by American Express spotlights the rising importance of first-party purchase data for targeted marketing, a core capability within Cardlytics' platform partnerships. We'll examine how Cardlytics' integration with premier financial institutions may...
